paper_abstract: In this paper, two dynamic models of high-speed train are presented, namely a single-mass (SM) model and an unit-displacement multi-particle (UDMP) model. Based on the former, a direct fuzzy logic controller is designed, and on the latter, a new fuzzy controller incorporating the implication logic is designed. Three sets of relevant numerical simulation are provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed control schemes through comparison.
paper_title: Extended fuzzy logic controller for high speed train
